tasks.label: wait-for-backend
args: write-host 'Waiting for Backend (port 8080)...'; $retries = 30; while ($retries -gt 0) { try { $client = New-Object System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient('127.0.0.1', 8080); $client.Close(); write-host 'Backend is ready!'; exit 0 } catch { start-sleep -seconds 1; $retries-- } } write-host 'Backend failed to start.'; exit 1
